General.Name: Methanol Chemicals Company
General.Description: Methanol Chemicals Company manufactures and sells methanol derivatives, formaldehyde derivatives, superplasticizers, and various amino resins in the Middle East and internationally. It offers aqueous formaldehyde solution, urea formaldehyde concentrate, hexamethylene tetramine, paraformaldehyde, urea formaldehyde powder resin, melamine formaldehyde powder resin, melamine urea formaldehyde resin, sulphonated naphthalene formaldehyde, hexane methylene tetramine, phenol formaldehyde resins, and liquid and powder Formaldehyde resins. The company also provides dimethylamine, trimethylamine, methanol, monomethylamine, dimethyl formamide, pentaerythritol, sodium formate, carbon monoxide, concrete improvers, acetaldehyde, and penta aritheretol. It serves leather, textile, pharma, electronics, PCBs and CCL, synthetics, oil refining, paint, lubricants, detergents, insulation, oil and gas, electroplating, fertilizer, resins, rubber, explosive, fuel, poultry, water, agrochemical, wood, laminates, melamine ware, and soap industries. The company was formerly known as Saudi Formaldehyde Chemical Company Limited. Methanol Chemicals Company was founded in 1989 and is based in Jubail, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Al Jubail Industrial City, Jubail, Saudi Arabia, 31951
